statements: SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT expense_name, expense_date FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_name LIKE '%food%';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT expense_id, expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_amount ASC;
SELECT expense_id, expense_name FROM expenses WHERE expense_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT id, expense_name, amount FROM expenses;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT budget_name, amount FROM budgets WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, expense_name, date FROM expenses WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT id, expense_name, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT expense_name, amount FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, budget_name FROM budgets WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses e JOIN budgets b ON e.amount = b.amount AND e.date = b.start_date ORDER BY e.date DESC, b.end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT expense_name, amount, date FROM expenses ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT budget_name, amount FROM budgets WHERE amount < 500
SELECT report_name, total_expenses, total_budgets FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM financial_reports ORDER BY total_budgets DESC
SELECT expense_name, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT budget_name, amount FROM budgets WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY budget_name ASC
SELECT report_name, report_date, total_expenses, total_budgets FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_budgets DESC
SELECT expense_name, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE amount < 500 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT budget_name, amount, budget_id FROM budgets WHERE budget_name LIKE '%office%' ORDER BY budget_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Expenses;
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount, category FROM Expenses WHERE expense_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT expense_amount, category FROM Expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Budgets WHERE budget_month = '2022-02-28';
SELECT budget_category, budget_amount FROM Budgets ORDER BY budget_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC, expense_date ASC
SELECT expense_amount, expense_date FROM Expenses WHERE category='Food'
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE category='Transportation' AND expense_amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT SUM(expense_amount) FROM Expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT budget_month, SUM(budget_amount) FROM Budgets GROUP BY budget_month
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, description, amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name FROM categories WHERE category_id < 5;
SELECT expense_id, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE amount >= 100;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT description, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT e.description, u.username FROM expenses e JOIN expenses_log el ON e.expense_id = el.expense_id JOIN users u ON el.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY e.date ASC;
SELECT c.name, SUM(b.amount) AS total_budget FROM categories c JOIN budgets b ON c.category_id = b.category_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING total_budget > 5000;

SELECT u.username, e.description, e.amount, b.amount AS budget_amount FROM users u JOIN expenses_log el ON u.user_id = el.user_id JOIN expenses e ON el.expense_id = e.expense_id JOIN budgets b ON e.amount <= b.amount AND b.year = 2022 ORDER BY u.username, e.description DESC;
